title: India set to transition from detective to predictive disease surveillance
description: India is set to make a major leap in strengthening public health security by shifting from a detective-style disease surveillance model to a predictive analysis model, integrating technologies such as artificial intelligence (AI), real-time data analytics and digital intelligence platforms.

title: Taiwan, Florida cities deploy AI to address rising urbanization challenges
description: TAIPEI, TAIWAN - Media-OutReach Newswire - 18 November 2025 - In Taoyuan's traffic control center, dozens of monitors display green lights cascading through city streets. When an ambulance races toward a hospital, artificial intelligence clears its path in seconds, turning life-threatening traffic jams into seamless journeys.

title: AI-assisted shopping is the talk of the holiday shopping season

title: Deutsche Telekom and Schwarz Group to build AI data centre, German newspaper reports
description: Deutsche Telekom and the Schwarz Group are planning to jointly build a gigafactory for artificial intelligence, German newspaper Handelsblatt reported on Sunday.
content:
An "AI gigafactory" is a facility designed specifically to support the massive computing needs of AI.

title: ByteDance’s TikTok Playbook Is Winning Consumer AI
description: ByteDance Ltd. is best known abroad as the embattled parent of TikTok. At home, though, it has quietly seized the crown for China’s top consumer artificial intelligence app while bucking all the trends — a feat that offers lessons in the global tech race.

title: Globe says AI use has helped it save P125M
description: GLOBE Telecom Inc. on Sunday said that it had saved more than 11.3 million kilowatt-hours (kWh) of electricity last year, equivalent to approximately P125 million, by using artificial intelligence (AI) to drive smarter and more efficient energy use across its network and facilities.
